ygData.subject: where is illusion: halfling?
ygData.msgSnippet: I can also now confirm that Illusion:Erudite has absolutely no effect except putting the spell icon in the corner.  There really ought to be an Illusion:
ygData.messageBody:
I can also now confirm that Illusion:Erudite has absolutely no effect
except putting the spell icon in the corner. There really ought to be an
"Illusion: Change Face" spell that would randomize the character graphic,
(and an "Illusion: Leather/Chain/Plate" series that gave some AC and made
it look like you were wearing armor). Ah, well.

Next question: is Illusion: Halfling available anywhere outside of Erudin?
I'm Currently based in Freeport (though camped in Highkeep after getting
my pet), and would like to avoid the trip. I was hoping to find it in
Neriak, but didn't see it.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
